courierServices.ContainerClasses

Class Orders

  • java.lang.Object
    • courierServices.ContainerClasses.Orders
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Orders
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing all orders. This class also implements Serializable interface for writing object to file.
    Author:
    Shubham Kumar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long ORDER_INITIALIZER
      Order Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for order ID Also stores last created order ID.

      Orders()
      Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Field Detail

      • ORDER_INITIALIZER

        public static long ORDER_INITIALIZER
        Order Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for order ID Also stores last created order ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Orders

        public Orders()
        Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Method Detail

      • printListHeader

        public static void printListHeader()
        Prints table header, When list of all orders is printed as ToString this function prints table header.

      • addNewOrder

        public long addNewOrder(long custID)
        Add New Order: Takes input from console and generates new Order by adding newly created Order class object to arraylist. New Order ID is selected using static ORDER INITIALIZER variable, after creation ORDER INITIALIZER variable is incremented by 1.
        Returns:
        Order ID of created Employee.

      • addTrackedLocation

        public boolean addTrackedLocation(java.lang.String locName,
                                  long orderID)
        Adds tracked location to an Order. It takes location name as string, converts it to Location (enum), and adds it to given order.
        Parameters:
        locName - - Name of Location as String
        orderID - - Order ID
        Returns:
        boolean value (true/false)

      • cancelOrder

        public boolean cancelOrder(long orderId,
                           long custId)
        Cancels an order before order being processed. Takes order ID and customer ID, checks orders' In_process flag. Then it deletes the order if In_process flag is false.
        Parameters:
        orderId - - Order ID
        custId - - Customer ID
        Returns:
        boolean value (true/false)

      • copy

        public Orders copy(Orders object)
        Function to copy Orders object. It assigns arraylist of passed object to caller object.
        Parameters:
        object - - Orders object whose value to be equated
        Returns:
        this - in case of a condition a = b.copy(c);

      • displayOrderDetails

        public boolean displayOrderDetails(long orderId,
                                   long custId)
        Displays All details of given order. It checks passed customer ID and Order ID, and then calls displayOrderDetails function of Order class
        Parameters:
        custId - - Customer ID
        Returns:
        boolean value true if given details are valid, else false.

      • printCustomerAllOrders

        public void printCustomerAllOrders(long custId)
        Displays details of all orders of a given customer using Order's toString function. It shows a single order in a single row. It compares passed customer ID with all customer IDs, and then uses toString function of Order class
        Parameters:
        custId - - Customer ID

      • printAllOrders

        public void printAllOrders()
        Displays details of all orders using Order's toString function. It shows a single order in a single row.

      • printTrackedLocations

        public boolean printTrackedLocations(long orderId,
                                     long custId)
        Prints tracked location of given order for a particular customer.
        Parameters:
        orderId - - Order ID
        custId - - Customer ID
        Returns:
        boolean value : false if passed details are valid, else true.

      • printUnprocessedOrders

        public void printUnprocessedOrders()
        Prints all orders that are unprocessed, by checking In_process flag of the order.

      • setOrderInProcessFlag

        public boolean setOrderInProcessFlag(long orderId)
        Sets the value of InProcess flag as true. Firstly, it checks the order id and returns false if it is invalid.
        Parameters:
        orderId - - Order ID
        Returns:
        boolean value (true/false)
